Training to be a flight attendant takes 4-6 weeks of emergency drills, fire fighting & more.The wings they wear are only given once training is done. @1512jaspreet Hi there, as mentioned yesterday, the support team will get back to you as soon as they can. We are experiencing higher than normal call volumes due to the holidays. Unfortunately, the social media team does not have access to bookings.

data.text:
Fresh outta quarantine and enjoying a perfect Canadian welcome! The team at #flairair treated me to my first double double, and man are they WORTH. THE. HYPE! 🙌

#timhortons #firstelfficer https://t.co/FnN4tD8my9

@CraigDrebit I would suggest contacting our support team when you are ready.  Please email support@flyflair.com or you can also call 1-855-936-5656, you will have the option to Press 1 to text with an agent.
@MitchCookie1644 You're welcome.  If you have taken the steps above then you are in the queue and they will get to you.  They are a small but mighty team, so sometimes it does take some time.

urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text:
Friendly Reminder! 💚

We've partnered up with https://t.co/kykYHWueMV to bring you the best deals in all of our Canadian destinations. If you need a hotel, book right from the https://t.co/Ehj3JcVjh5 site! https://t.co/hjOLej7OGg

@MitchCookie1644 Hi there!  If you are on hold then you are in the queue to be helped.  You can also send an email to support@flyflair.com with your booking ID and concern, so when they get to your call they have all of your details.
@MitchCookie1644 Send all the details in an email to support@flyflair.com.
@itsjasonpillay Please send us a DM with details.

Save some green. Subscribe to our newsletter for our lowest fares. 💸

https://t.co/rSY1NVsaSJ https://t.co/ulYmMikWlA

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Ever so patiently waiting on my rapid COVID test results to come in, so I can start adventuring around Canada! Until then... I’ll be here, in quarantine. 🤷🏽‍♀️ #sendsnacks 🍟🍰🍦🍪

#firstelfficer #flairair https://t.co/9wwIou00Hs

users.name: Dan Gallant • Play La Bamba, Babay
